content.text: My name is Jen and I'm a 28 year old artist who loves to be creative!
Nice to meet you Jen! I'm Sarah and I'm a 25 year old teacher who loves to read and write!
That's so cool! I love reading too but I'm not very good at writing.
I'm actually really good at writing, but I don't have much time for it anymore since I started teaching.
I understand that. I used to work as a teacher but I quit to focus on my art.
That's so brave! I'm not sure I could ever do that.
It was definitely a scary decision, but it was the right one for me.
I'm glad it worked out for you! What kind of art do you create?
I mostly draw and paint, but I also do some sculpture and jewelry making.
That sounds amazing! I would love to see some of your work sometime.
Sure, I can send you some pictures later.
Great! I'm excited to see it.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
